content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I installed the geopy package using the "execute_shell" command. The installation was successful and I received a warning about running pip as the 'root' user. It is recommended to use a virtual environment instead. A new release of pip is also available.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.starapradelna.cz/", "question": "What can I learn about the Stara Pradelna house and the surrounding area?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an advertisement for the Stara Pradelna house, which is a restaurant and accommodation located near the Veveří Castle in Brno-Bystrc. The restaurant offers Czech cuisine, salads, and homemade desserts, and is situated in a picturesque natural setting. The text also mentions upcoming events and a menu, as well as the availability of reservations for both dining and events.\n\nLinks: [' (https://www.starapradelna.cz)', 'Domů (https://www.starapradelna.cz)', 'Rezervace (https://www.starapradelna.cz)', 'Ubytování (https://www.airbnb.cz/rooms/50128438?source_impression_id=p3_1670672349_HbPgY5iazi5%2F5Yqj)', 'Jídelní lístek (https://www.starapradelna.cz/jidelni-listek)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Brno Reservoir trail"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada", "https://hikingisgood.com/around-the-brno-reservoir/", "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/", "https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/place/brno-reservoir/", "http://experienceeurope.eu/hiking-in-brno-my-top-5/", "https://www.south-moravia.com/en/sights/o70544-brno-reservoir", "https://www.tripsavvy.com/top-things-to-do-in-brno-czech-republic-5112855"]', type='action_result')]
"""
